speaker: Doctor
text: I'm going to get you an antibiotic for this seemingly really tough pneumonia–I am glad and amazed that you were able to make it in. You should be able to pick it up from your pharmacy. I want you to take 2 pills today, then 250 mg daily for the next eight or so days. If after you complete your course you are still seeing issues, give us a call and we'll set up something immediately.
